page.title: 13FAMILY LIFE--THE HOME
page.content: The family usually live together until children grown-up unless parents separated or divorced. Husband out working during day unless self employed at home or retired. Few unemployed. Wife at home caring for children and/or house, or working, paid or voluntary, full or part time. Some domestic help employed. Meals eaten together. Diet is mainly meat based, freshly prepared and often includes home grown produce. "Whole" foods popular, some convenience food. Bread,cakes,preserves,wine,beer and honey made.Produce also frozen. Labour saving devices-food mixer,refrigerator ,freezer,dishwasher,vacuum cleaner, washing and drying machines,electric iron. Most houses have radio(s), television(s),telephone and car(s). Some have record player,video recorder and home computer.
